span.description: number of column the grid spans

push.description: number of columns that grid moves to the right

pull.description: number of columns that grid moves to the left

xs.description: <768px Responsive columns or column props object

sm.description: ≥768px Responsive columns or column props object

md.description: ≥992 Responsive columns or column props object

lg.description: ≥1200 Responsive columns or column props object

xl.description: ≥1200px Responsive columns or column props object, version >= 2

fill.description: border and background color when button is active

true-label.description: value of the checkbox if it's checked

false-label.description: value of the checkbox if it's not checked

rows.description: number of rows of textarea, only works when type is 'textarea'

autosize.description: whether textarea has an adaptive height, only works when type is 'textarea'. Can accept an object, e.g. { minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }

custom-item.description: component name of your customized suggestion list item

fetch-suggestions.description: a method to fetch input suggestions. When suggestions are ready, invoke callback(data:[]) to return them to Autocomplete

trigger-on-focus.description: whether show suggestions when input focus

on-icon-click.description: hook function when clicking on the input icon

debounce.description: debounce delay when typing, in millisecond

multiple-limit.description: maximum number of options user can select when multiple is true. No limit when set to 0

loading-text.description: displayed text while loading data from server

no-match-text.description: displayed text when no data matches the filtering query

no-data-text.description: displayed text when there is no options

expand-trigger.description: trigger mode of expanding current item

show-all-levels.description: whether to display all levels of the selected value in the input

on-text.description: text displayed when in on state, version < 2

off-text.description: text displayed when in off state, version < 2

on-value.description: switch value when in on state, default: true, version < 2

off-value.description: switch value when in off state, default: false, version < 2

on-color.description: background color when in on state, default: #20A0FF, version < 2

off-color.description: background color when in off state, default: #C0CCDA, version < 2

active-text.description: text displayed when in on state, version >= 2

inactive-text.description: text displayed when in off state, version >= 2

active-value.description: switch value when in on state, default: true, version >= 2

inactive-value.description: switch value when in off state, default: false, version >= 2

active-color.description: background color when in on state, default: #409EFF, version >= 2

inactive-color.description: background color when in off state, default: #C0CCDA, version >= 2

tooltip-class.description: custom class name for the tooltip

allow-drag.description: this function will be executed before dragging a node. If false is returned, the node can not be dragged, type: Function

allow-drop.description: this function will be executed before the dragging node is dropped. If false is returned, the dragging node can not be dropped at the target node, type: Function

format.description: year yyyy month MM day dd, hour HH, minute mm, second ss, default: yyyy-MM-dd

default-value.description: optional default time of the picker, type: Date

accept.description: accepted file types, will not work when thumbnail-mode is true

on-preview.description: hook function when clicking the uploaded files, type: function(file)

on-remove.description: hook function when files are removed, type: function(file, fileList)

on-success.description: hook function when uploaded successfully, type: function(response, file, fileList)

on-error.description: hook function when some errors occurs, type: function(err, file, fileList)

on-progress.description: hook function when some progress occurs, type: function(event, file, fileList)

on-change.description: hook function when select file or upload file success or upload file fail, type: function(file, fileList)

before-upload.description: hook function before uploading with the file to be uploaded as its parameter. If false is returned or a Promise is returned and then is rejected, uploading will be aborted, type: function(file)

before-remove.description: hook function before removing a file with the file and file list as its parameters. If false is returned or a Promise is returned and then is rejected, removing will be aborted. type: function(file, fileList)

http-request.description: override default xhr behavior, allowing you to implement your own upload-file's request

low-threshold.description: hreshold value between low and medium level. The value itself will be included in low level, default: 2

high-threshold.description: threshold value between medium and high level. The value itself will be included in high level, default: 4

colors.description: color array for icons. It should have 3 elements, each of which corresponds with a score level, default: ['#F7BA2A', '#F7BA2A', '#F7BA2A']

disabled-void-color.description: color of unselected read-only icons, default: #EFF2F7

text-template.description: text template when the component is read-only, default: {value}

color-format.description: color format of v-model, default: hex(when show-alpha is false)/rgb(when show-alpha is true)

render-content.description: custom render function for data items

left-default-checked.description: key array of initially checked data items of the left list, default: []

right-default-checked.description: key array of initially checked data items of the right list, default: []

model.description: data of form component, type: object

error.description: field error message, set its value and the field will validate error and show this message immediately

current-row-key.description: key of current row, a set only prop

row-class-name.description: function that returns custom class names for a row, or a string assigning class names for every row

header-row-class-name.description: function that returns custom class names for a row in table header, or a string assigning class names for every row in table header

header-row-style.description: function that returns custom style for a row in table header, or an object assigning custom style for every row in table header

header-cell-class-name.description: function that returns custom class names for a cell in table header, or a string assigning class names for every cell in table header

header-cell-style.description: function that returns custom style for a cell in table header, or an object assigning custom style for every cell in table header

cell-class-name.description: function that returns custom class names for a cell, or a string assigning class names for every cell

cell-style.description: function that returns custom style for a cell, or an object assigning custom style for every cell

row-style.description: function that returns custom style for a row, or a string assigning custom style for every row

row-key.description: key of row data, used for optimizing rendering. Required if 'reserve-selection' is on

expand-row-keys.description: set expanded rows by this prop, prop's value is the keys of expand rows, you should set row-key before using this prop, type: Array

default-sort.description: set the default sort column and order. property prop is used to set default sort column, property order is used to set default sort order

sum-text.description: displayed text for the first column of summary row, default: Sum

span-method.description: method that returns rowspan and colspan

column-key.description: column's key. If you need to use the filter-change event, you need this attribute to identify which column is being filtered

fixed.description: whether column is fixed at left/right. Will be fixed at left if 'true'

render-header.description: render function for table header of this column

sort-method.description: sorting method, works when 'sortable' is true. Should return a number, just like Array.sort, type: Function(a, b)

sort-by.description: specify which property to sort by, works when 'sortable' is true and 'sort-method' is undefined. If set to an Array, the column will sequentially sort by the next property if the previous one is equal, type: Function(row, index)/String/Array

header-align.description: alignment of the table header. If omitted, the value of the 'align' attribute will be applied

label-class-name.description: class name of the label of this column

selectable.description: function that determines if a certain row can be selected, works when type is 'selection' Function(row, index)

filters.description: an array of data filtering options. For each element in this array, 'text' and 'value' are required

filtered-value.description: filter value for selected data, might be useful when table header is rendered with 'render-header'

stroke-width.description: the width of progress bar, default: 6

node-key.description: unique identity key name for nodes, its value should be unique across the whole tree

current-node-key.description: key of current node, a set only prop

default-expanded-keys.description: array of keys of initially expanded nodes

default-checked-keys.description: array of keys of initially checked nodes

filter-node-method.description: this function will be executed on each node when use filter method. if return 'false', tree node will be hidden.

indent.description: horizontal indentation of nodes in adjacent levels in pixels, default: 16

page-size.description: item count of each page, default: 10

page-count.description: total page count. Set either 'total' or 'page-count' and pages will be displayed; if you need 'page-sizes', total is required

current-page.description: current page number, supports the .sync modifier, default: 1

layout.description: layout of Pagination, elements separated with a comma

page-sizes.description: options of item count per page, example: [10, 20]

default-openeds.description: array that contains keys of currently active sub-menus

menu-trigger.description: how sub-menus are triggered, only works when mode is 'horizontal', default: hover

to.description: target route of the link, same as to of vue-router

command.description: a command to be dispatched to Dropdown's 'command' callback

space.description: the spacing of each step, will be responsive if omitted. Support percentage.

process-status.description: status of current step, default: process

finish-status.description: status of end step, default: finish

top.description: value for top of Dialog CSS, works when size is not full, default: 15%

before-close.description: callback before Dialog closes, and it will prevent Dialog from closing

header.description: Title of the card. Also accepts a DOM passed by slot#header

body-style.description: CSS style of body,type: object, default: {padding: '20px'}

initial-index.description: index of the initially active slide (starting from 0), default: 0

interval.description: interval of the auto loop, in milliseconds, default: 30000

arrow.description: when arrows are shown, default: hover

value-key.description: unique identity key name for value, required when value is an object

hide-after.description: timeout in milliseconds to hide tooltip, default: 0

start-placeholder.description: placeholder for the start time in range mode

end-placeholder.description: placeholder for the end time in range mode

value-format.description: optional, format of binding value. If not specified, the binding value will be a Date object

on-exceed.description: hook function when limit is exceeded

show-timeout.description: Delay time before show a dropdown, default: 250

hide-timeout.description: Delay time before hide a dropdown, default: 150

default-time.description: The time value to use when selecting date range, type: string[]

target-order.description: order strategy for elements in the target list. If set to 'original', the elements will keep the same order as the data source. If set to 'push', the newly added elements will be pushed to the bottom. If set to 'unshift', the newly added elements will be inserted on the top, default: original

input-size.description: size of the input box, default: small

el-submenu/show-timeout.description: timeout before showing a sub-menu, default: 300

el-submenu/hide-timeout.description: timeout before hiding a sub-menu, default: 300

el-input/on-icon-click.description: hook function when clicking on the input icon

el-transfer/footer-format.description: texts for checking status in list footer

el-transfer/format.description: texts for checking status in list footer, default: { noChecked: '${total} items', hasChecked: '${checked}/${total} checked' }

el-menu/background-color.description: background color of Menu (hex format), default: #ffffff

el-menu/text-color.description: text color of Menu (hex format), default: #2d2f33

el-menu/active-text-color.description: text color of currently active menu item (hex format), default: #409EFF

el-tooltip/content.description: display content, can be overridden by slot#content

el-popover/content.description: popover content, can be replaced with a default slot

el-popover/trigger.description: how the popover is triggered, default: click

el-tabs/name.description: identifier corresponding to the activeName of Tabs, representing the alias of the tab-pane

el-step/status.description: current status. It will be automatically set by Steps if not configured.

el-progress/status.description: the current status of progress bar

el-table-column/min-width.description: column minimum width. Columns with width has a fixed width, while columns with min-width has a width that is distributed in proportion

el-table/empty-text.description: Displayed text when data is empty. You can customize this area with slot='empty'

el-tree/empty-text.description: text displayed when data is void

el-form-item/prop.description: a key of model. In the use of validate and resetFields method, the attribute is required

el-table-column/prop.description: field name. You can also use its alias: property

el-row/offset.description: number of spacing on the left side of the grid

el-carousel-item/name.description: name of the item, can be used in 'setActiveItem'

el-upload/name.description: key name for uploaded file, default: 'file'

el-input/step.description: same as step in native input

el-dropdown/type.description: menu button type, refer to Button Component, only works when 'split-button' is true

el-progress/type.description: the type of progress bar, default: line

el-row/type.description: layout mode, you can use 'flex', works in modern browsers

el-input/type.description: Same as the 'type' attribute of native input, except that it can be 'textarea'

el-date-picker/type.description: type of the picker, default: date

el-table-column/type.description: type of the column. If set to 'selection', the column will display checkbox. If set to 'index', the column will display index of the row (staring from 1). If set to 'expand', the column will display expand icon.

el-slider/debounce.description: debounce delay when typing, in millisecond, works when 'show-input' is true, default: 300

el-autocomplete/debounce.description: debounce delay when typing, in milliseconds, default: 300

el-badge/max.description: maximum value, shows '{max}+' when exceeded. Only works if 'value' is a Number

el-slider/height.description: Slider height, required in vertical mode

el-table/height.description: Table's height. By default it has an auto height. If its value is a number, the height is measured in pixels; if its value is a string, the height is affected by external styles

el-table/max-height.description: Table's max-height. The height of the table starts from 'auto' until it reaches the maxHeight limit. The 'maxHeight' is measured in pixels, same as 'heigh't

el-time-select/value.description: value of the picker, default: HH:mm:ss

el-tooltip/open-delay.description: delay of appearance, in millisecond, default: 0

el-popover/open-delay.description: delay of appearance when trigger is hover, in milliseconds

collapse-transition.description: whether to enable the collapse transition, default: true

select-on-indeterminate.description: controls the behavior of master checkbox in multi-select tables when only some rows are selected (but not all). If true, all rows will be selected, else deselected. default: true

popper-append-to-body.description: whether to append the popper menu to body. If the positioning of the popper is wrong, you can try to set this prop to false, default: true

validate-on-rule-change.description: whether to trigger validation when the 'rules' prop is changed, default: true

fullscreen.description: whether the Dialog takes up full screen, default: false

autoplay.description: whether automatically loop the slides, default: true

enterable.description: enterable whether the mouse can enter the tooltip, default: true

show-close.description: whether to show a close button, default: true

close-on-press-escape.description: whether the Dialog can be closed by pressing ESC, default: true

close-on-click-modal.description: whether the Dialog can be closed by clicking the mask, default: true

lock-scroll.description: whether scroll of body is disabled while Dialog is displayed, default: true

modal-append-to-body.description: whether to append modal to body element. If false, the modal will be appended to Dialog's parent element, default: true

append-to-body.description: whether to append Dialog itself to body. A nested Dialog should have this attribute set to 'true', default: false

modal.description: whether a mask is displayed, default: true

visible.description: visibility of Dialog, supports the '.sync' modifier, default: false

hide-on-click.description: whether to hide menu after clicking menu-item

split-button.description: whether a button group is displayed

replace.description: if 'true', the navigation will not leave a history record, default: false

auto-expand-parent.description: whether to expand father node when a child node is expanded, default: true

expand-on-click-node.description: whether to expand or collapse node when clicking on the node, if false, then expand or collapse node only when clicking on the arrow icon, default: true

filter-multiple.description: whether data filtering supports multiple options

fit.description: whether width of column automatically fits its container

indeterminate.description: same as indeterminate in native checkbox

plain.description: determine whether it's a plain button

allow-half.description: whether picking half start is allowed

thumbnail-mode.description: whether thumbnail is displayed, default: false

show-upload-list.description: whether to show the uploaded file list, default: true

collapse.description: whether the menu is collapsed (available only in vertical mode)

el-collapse/accordion.description: whether to activate accordion mode, default: false

el-tree/accordion.description: whether only one node among the same level can be expanded at one time, default: false

el-button/round.description: determine whether it's a round button, default: false

check.description: triggers after clicking the checkbox of a node

tab-click.description: triggers when a tab is clicked

tab-remove.description: triggers when tab-remove button is clicked

tab-add.description: triggers when tab-add button is clicked

edit.description: triggers when tab-add button or tab-remove is clicked

node-click.description: triggers when a node is clicked

node-contextmenu.description: triggers when a node is clicked by right button

check-change.description: triggers when the selected state of the node changes

active-item-change.description: triggers when active option changes, only works when 'change-on-select' is 'false'

select-all.description: triggers when user clicks the checkbox in table header, arg: selection

selection-change.description: triggers when selection changes, arg: selection

cell-mouse-enter.description: triggers when hovering into a cell, arg: row, column, cell, event

cell-mouse-leave.description: triggers when hovering out of a cell, arg: row column, cell, event

cell-click.description: triggers when clicking a cell, arg: row, column, cell, event

cell-dbclick.description: triggers when double clicking a cell, arg: row, column, cell, event

row-click.description: triggers when clicking a row, arg: row, event, column

row-contextmenu.description: triggers when user right clicks on a row, arg: row, event

row-dbclick.description: triggers when double clicking a row, arg: row, event

header-click.description: triggers when clicking a column header, arg: column, event

sort-change.description: triggers when Table's sorting changes, arg: { column, prop, order }

filter-change.description: column's key. If you need to use the filter-change event, this attribute is mandatory to identify which column is being filtered, arg: filters

current-change.description: triggers when current row changes, arg: currentRow, oldCurrentRow

header-draggend.description: triggers when finish dragging header, arg: newWidth, oldWidth, column, event

expand.description: triggers when user expands or collapses a row, arg: row, expanded

expand-change.description: triggers when user expands or collapses a row, arg: row, expanded

left-check-change.description: triggers when end user changes the checked state of any data item in the left list

right-check-change.description: triggers when end user changes the checked state of any data item in the right list

node-drag-enter.description: triggers when the dragging node enters another node

node-drag-leave.description: triggers when the dragging node leaves a node

node-drag-over.description: triggers when dragging over a node (like mouseover event)

node-drop.description: triggers after the dragging node is dropped

validate.description: triggers after a form item is validated

el-table/select.description: triggers when user clicks the checkbox in a row, arg: selection, row

el-dropdown/command.description: triggers when a dropdown item is clicked

el-input/clear.description: triggers when the Input is cleared by the button which generated by the 'clearable' attribute

el-select/clear.description: triggers when the clear icon is clicked in a clearable Select

el-popover/after-enter.description: triggers when the entering transition ends

el-popover/after-leave.description: triggers when the leaving transition ends

draggable.description: whether enable tree nodes drag and drop

reserve-keyword.description: when 'multiple' and 'filter' is true, whether to reserve current keyword after selecting an option

default-first-option.description: select first matching option on enter key. Use with 'filterable' or 'remote'

arrow-control.description: whether to pick time using arrow buttons, only works with <el-time-picker>

time-arrow-control.description: whether to pick time using arrow buttons

status-icon.description: whether to display an icon indicating the validation result

select-when-unmatched.description: whether to emit a 'select' event on enter when there is no autocomplete match

manual.description: whether to control Tooltip manually. mouseenter and mouseleave won't have effects if set to 'true', default: false

router.description: whether vue-router mode is activated. If true, index will be used as 'path' to activate the route action

unique-opened.description: whether only one sub-menu can be active

show-icon.description: if a type icon is displayed

check-strictly.description: whether checked state of a node not affects its father and child nodes when 'show-checkbox' is 'true'

text-inside.description: whether to place the percentage inside progress bar, only works when type is 'line'

hit.description: whether Tag has a highlighted border

close-transition.description: whether the removal animation is disabled

reserve-selection.description: whether to reserve selection after data refreshing, works when type is 'selection'

show-overflow-tooltip.description: whether to hide extra content and show them in a tooltip when hovering on the cell

resizable.description: whether column width can be resized, works when border of 'el-table' is 'true'

show-alpha.description: whether to display the alpha slider

drag.description: whether to activate drag and drop mode

change-on-select.description: whether selecting an option of any level is permitted

show-input.description: whether to display an input box, works when 'range' is false, default: false

show-input-controls.description: whether to display control buttons when 'show-input' is true, default: true

show-stops.description: whether to display breakpoints, default: false

show-tooltip.description: whether to display tooltip value, default: true

show-score.description: whether to display current score. show-score and show-text cannot be true at the same time

background.description: whether the buttons have a background color

collapse-tags.description: whether to collapse tags to a text when multiple selecting

el-dialog/center.description: whether to align the header and footer in center

el-form/inline-message.description: whether to display the error message inline with the form item

void-icon-class.description: class name of unselected icons, default: el-icon-star-off

disabled-void-icon-class.description: class name of unselected read-only icons, default: el-icon-star-on

icon-classes.description: array of class names of icons. It should have 3 elements, each of which corresponds with a score level, default: ['el-icon-star-on', 'el-icon-star-on','el-icon-star-on']

on-icon-class.description: class name of the icon displayed when in on state, overrides 'on-text', version < 2

off-icon-class.description: class name of the icon displayed when in off state, overrides 'off-text', version < 2

active-icon-class.description: class name of the icon displayed when in on state, overrides 'active-text', version >= 2

inactive-icon-class.description: class name of the icon displayed when in off state, overrides 'inactive-text', version >= 2
